contributionDescription: Using individual wallets and fundings to test the operation and scalability of the Optimism network.  By using different wallet like Metamask and Trezor, we are able to learn the stability and reliability of the Optimism network.  Check the Optimism Network how busy it is and whether it is working with the different wallets.
impactDescription: If we are able to find the any issues or errors by using  by using different wallet like Metamask and Trezor, we are able to learn the stability and reliability of the Optimism network. We can then inform the Optimism Network Team to resolve the errors and issues on a timely matter.
pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application should be categorized as "PROJECT" as it does not refer to any individual efforts or statements like "I" or "me". It is more focused on a wider project effort.
